form.label: Troubleshooting Resource Usage Per User Drilldown
form.description: Drilldown for Troubleshooting Resource Usage Per User

search.query: index=_audit host=$host$ "info=granted" OR "info=completed" OR "info=canceled" search_id IN ($sid$) | stats min(timestamp) AS time, values(user) AS user, values(total_run_time) AS total_run_time, values(result_count) AS result_count, values(search) AS search, values(host) AS host, values(apiStartTime) AS startTime, values(apiEndTime) AS endTime, values(info) AS info, values(savedsearch_name) AS savedsearch_name by search_id | eval app="$app$", label="$label$" | eval start=strptime(startTime, "'%a %b %d %H:%M:%S %Y"), end=strptime(endTime, "'%a %b %d %H:%M:%S %Y") | eval period=tostring(round(end-start), "duration") | table time, app, user, total_run_time, result_count, period, search, label, host, startTime, endTime, info, savedsearch_name, search_id
